remarks: The inverse of a cyclic generator is a generator.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
iscyg.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
iscyg.2 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
iscyg3.e $e |- E = { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. x ) ) = B } $.
cyggeninv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
cyggeninv $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. E ) -> ( N ` X ) e. E ) $.
$d .x. n x $.
$d B n x $.
$d G n x $.
$d N n x $.
$d X n x $.
